page.title: 16CRUWYS MORCHARD RECREATION
page.content: There are many supporters, both riders and followers, of local hunts. Cub-hunting on foot starts the first week in September. Tiverton Foxhounds meet twice-weekly from November to March,{35-40 riders moving off at 11am {Holcombe Rogus Beagles pack hunts with {huntsmen and followers on foot. {Tiverton Staghounds attract spectators {from miles around. {One family keeps Welsh Mountain ponies {and takes part in equestrian events. {Darts, skittles and pool teams from {the Cruwys Arms, Pennymoor, compete {against other pubs and clubs during {the winter. Discos in the Parish Hall {are very popular with the young. {Pre-Christmas whist-drives attract all {age-groups. Golf-players have to {travel to the nearest course at {Tiverton. Some very good gardeners {show their produce at the Flower Show.
